Info.Title: Knowing
Info.Writer: Ryne Douglas Pearson (screenplay), Juliet Snowden (screenplay), Stiles White (screenplay), Ryne Douglas Pearson (story)
Info.Actors: Nicolas Cage, Chandler Canterbury, Rose Byrne, Lara Robinson
Info.Plot: M.I.T. professor John Koestler links a mysterious list of numbers from a time capsule to past and future disasters and sets out to prevent the ultimate catastrophe.
